div.p: Este sistema de código define o seguinte código:

tr.td: Reference to an equivalent LOINC code for this concept. Used to map custom codes to LOINC when available, supporting semantic interoperability with systems that use LOINC as primary terminology.

Status of the terminology code assignment process. Values include: 'mapped' (has equivalent in standard terminology), 'pending-loinc' (awaiting LOINC code assignment), 'pending-snomed' (awaiting SNOMED CT assignment), 'local-only' (intentionally local, no standard equivalent expected).
Reference to an equivalent SNOMED CT concept for this code. Used to map custom codes to SNOMED CT when available.
Path to the equivalent element in an openEHR archetype. Supports mapping between FHIR and openEHR representations of the same clinical concept.

description.value: Formal definitions for custom concept properties used in this Implementation Guide. These properties extend standard FHIR concept properties to support terminology mapping and lifecycle tracking for wearable health data concepts.

definition.value: Reference to an equivalent LOINC code for this concept. Used to map custom codes to LOINC when available, supporting semantic interoperability with systems that use LOINC as primary terminology.

Status of the terminology code assignment process. Values include: 'mapped' (has equivalent in standard terminology), 'pending-loinc' (awaiting LOINC code assignment), 'pending-snomed' (awaiting SNOMED CT assignment), 'local-only' (intentionally local, no standard equivalent expected).
Reference to an equivalent SNOMED CT concept for this code. Used to map custom codes to SNOMED CT when available.
Path to the equivalent element in an openEHR archetype. Supports mapping between FHIR and openEHR representations of the same clinical concept.
